text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Um... Mano's the one with the milk tea, and Hiori's got the latte.
Thank you, Meguru-chan... / Thank you, Meguru.
Hey, hey... I'm really looking forward to it!

...?
...Oh, could it be...
A live concert with everyone from 283 Production...!
Will there be rehearsals where everyone gathers...?

Hmm, I wonder... It's likely that rehearsals and
the actual performance will involve everyone...

Even if we can practice together,
it might be a really short time.

I see...
Then, until then, let's practice together...

I want us to enjoy ourselves to the fullest
when we're rehearsing with everyone...
Yeah, yeah!

Each of us preparing properly will surely
make it more enjoyable, right?

...Hmm, this feeling...
It's similar to something, isn't it?

Well, you know... Everyone preparing individually, and then
coming together as a group to complete it! Like that...

...Oh...
a school festival...?
Ah... / That's it...!

...As Meguru-chan said,
everyone working hard for a common goal...

...The culmination of many people's
efforts shaping the performance...

Yeah, and everyone enjoying themselves,
shining brightly... That's how it feels...

I see... Yeah.
Like individual stars shining brightly.
When we gather, we'll become a sky full of stars...!
...Yeah, if we can...

...To become like that...
I want to work hard in practice...
...Ah... stars.

...! It's true!
Over there!

Wow...
They're small, but they're twinkling...
Everyone's working hard and shining...!

...Once night falls,
the light of other stars will shine even brighter...
So we have to try our best not to get overshadowed...
Mano...
Your hand...!

...With all our might,
let's shine too...

...That's right.
Let's shine in our own way.

The three of us together...
And then, everyone from 283PRO together...!
There are more stars now than before.
Yeah... the night is coming soon.

...I wonder why...
My heart is pounding...

Me too...!
What could this be...?
It's hard to put into words...
...It feels like something is "beginning"...
